column4: Latest;Takeo:------ On the afternoon of May 17
column6: under the direction of Takeo Provincial Police Commissioner Sok Samnang
column7: there was a raid on an illegal marijuana plantation
column8: ------Police from ------Kirivong District ------cooperated with the Prey Amp commune administration and searched
column9: cleared and burned the marijuana in two locations on the hill of Dok Thmor in Takeo province
column10: which covered an area of ​​250 square meters.------Officers are now searching for the ganja growers to take legal action.------POST NEWS
